issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
App fails to launch when no HL source found in the project.

{code}
[INFO] :   Skipping Hyperloop compile, no usage found ...
[DEBUG] :  Generating stubs
2016-03-01T17:54:01.994Z | ERROR  | An uncaught exception was thrown!
Cannot convert undefined or null to object
2016-03-01T17:54:01.995Z | ERROR  | Cannot convert undefined or null to object
2016-03-01T17:54:01.995Z | TRACE  | TypeError: Cannot convert undefined or null to object
{code}
fields.summary: Hyperloop: fails to compile when no HL source found in the project
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio - 4.5.0
Appcelerator CLI - 5.2.0
Titanium SDK - 5.2.0.GA
Xcode - 7.2.1
iOS - 9.2 (Simulator)
OSX - El Captain
Hyperloop - 1.1.0

comments.body: [~hansknoechel] I thought so as well, but the error is different. No stack trace unfortunately.
